StudentsFeedback.P1: Amazing service! They got me my university Admission easily and they clearly know what they're doing. The university admissions team is knowledgeable, responsive, and always willing to help.I highly recommend them if youâ€™re Looking to secure a university acceptance
StudentsFeedback.P2: I would like to thank the Eduxa team for their tremendous efforts and for helping me secure a study admission in Switzerland. Their service was highly professional, and they were very patient in following up on every detail. I highly recommend working with them.
StudentsFeedback.P3: Honestly, the platform was easy to use and clarified many points I needed to understand before studying abroad. They helped me get everything sorted in record time, despite the tight schedule. ðŸ’œ

We help students find the right academic programs and support them through the application process. Additionally, we offer various supportive services such as student visa applications, booking suitable accommodation, airport reception in the study country, health insurance, and more.

CommonQuestion.Q3: Can I apply for language institute admission through Eduxa?

aboutUs.head: Eduxa is more than just a platform for studying abroad; rather, it embodies a passionate commitment to providing transformative learning journeys. It was founded by a group of travelers and education enthusiasts who believe in the power of cultural fusion.
aboutUs.paragraph: Our goal is to fulfill your dream of studying abroad by offering a carefully selected range of leading programs that stimulate your intellectual curiosity, enhance your skills, and propel you towards a bright future.

Blogs.head: Blogs
Blogs.paragraph: Choose your study destination from among the best international countries in education

commonQuest.head: The most common questions
commonQuest.paragraph: Do you have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions and their answers to facilitate your study journey.
commonQuest.ans1: Eduxa is a website that provides application services for language institutes and university admissions for bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees worldwide. We help students find the right academic programs and support them through the application process. Additionally, we offer various supportive services such as student visa applications, booking suitable accommodation, airport reception in the study country, health insurance, and more.
commonQuest.qus2: How can I benefit from Eduxa's services?
commonQuest.ans2: To benefit from Eduxa's services, you can visit our website and browse the available language offers and academic programs. After choosing the appropriate program, you can fill out the application form on the website, and we will assist you with the application process and document submission.
commonQuest.qus3: Can I apply for language institute admission through Eduxa?
commonQuest.ans3: Yes, we also provide application services for language institutes. You can choose your preferred institute and submit your application through the website.
commonQuest.qus4: Do you offer academic guidance and counseling in choosing the right academic program?
commonQuest.ans4: Yes, we provide educational counseling to help you choose the right academic programs according to your interests and goals. We can offer advice and information about universities, institutes, and various majors, assisting you in making a decision that fits your needs.
commonQuest.qus5: What documents are required for university admission?
commonQuest.ans5: The required documents may vary depending on factors such as the degree level, major, educational institution, and country. Commonly required documents include a resume, passport copy, previous academic certificates, recommendation letters, a statement of purpose, and a language certificate (if any). We will provide you with a detailed list of required documents for the program you wish to apply for.
commonQuest.qus6: Can I transfer from one university or institute to another?
commonQuest.ans6: Yes, you can transfer from one university or institute to another in certain cases. Transfer procedures vary from one educational institution to another and depend on each university or institution's specific policies and requirements. We can guide you in obtaining the necessary information about the transfer process and the specific requirements for each university.
commonQuest.qus7: Do you offer assistance in preparing resumes and statements of purpose?
commonQuest.ans7: Yes, we provide assistance in preparing resumes and statements of purpose. We can offer guidance and advice to ensure that your resume and statement of purpose effectively highlight your qualifications and experiences and reflect your academic and career goals.
commonQuest.qus8: Can I get information about tuition fees and expenses?
commonQuest.ans8: Yes, we can provide information about tuition fees and expenses for various academic programs. We will give you details about tuition fees and potential additional costs, including housing and living expenses, healthcare, textbooks, insurance, and more. We can also assist you in searching for available funding opportunities and scholarships.
commonQuest.qus9: What is the difference between unconditional and conditional admission?
commonQuest.ans9p1: Unconditional admission means that the student has been fully accepted and can start their academic program without any restrictions or conditions.
commonQuest.ans9p2: Conditional admission means that the student has been accepted but must meet certain conditions clearly stated in the acceptance letter, such as specific language proficiency levels like IELTS/TOEFL, additional tests like GMAT/GRE, or academic credential evaluations like WES/ECE.
commonQuest.qus10: How long does it take to get a response from universities after submitting an application?
commonQuest.ans10: Response times and application processing vary from one university to another. It may take some time to process applications and evaluate your documents. We usually advise submitting your application early to ensure it is processed correctly and meets the specified deadlines.

whoWeAre2.head: Know what distinguishes Eduxa
whoWeAre2.massage: Find out why Eduxa is the best choice to achieve your academic dreams
whoWeAre2.inf1: We envision a world where every student has the opportunity to expand their intellectual horizons through studying abroad. We strive to be the leading force in making international education a positive and unforgettable experience.
whoWeAre2.info2: We empower students to achieve their academic goals through personalized guidance and unwavering support, helping them build self-confidence and prepare to engage with the culture they intend to explore.

privacyPolicy.head: privacy policy
privacyPolicy.section2: At Eduxa, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you interact with our website and services.
privacyPolicy.section4: We may collect the following personal information:
privacyPolicy.section6: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
privacyPolicy.section8: Age, gender, nationality, and country of residence.
privacyPolicy.section10: Academic qualifications, program preferences, and university choices.
privacyPolicy.section14: Information about how you interact with our website, such as pages visited, time spent, and links clicked.
privacyPolicy.section16: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.section18: To process your application, match you with suitable programs, and provide ongoing support.
privacyPolicy.section20: To send you important updates, notifications, and promotional materials.
privacyPolicy.section22: To analyze user behavior and make improvements to our website and services.
privacyPolicy.section24: To protect your account and prevent unauthorized access.:
privacyPolicy.section26: To comply with legal obligations and regulations.
privacyPolicy.section28: We may share your personal information with the following third parties:
privacyPolicy.section30: To process your application and facilitate your enrollment.
privacyPolicy.section32: To process payments for application fees or program fees.
privacyPolicy.section34: To assist with technical support, marketing, and other services.:
privacyPolicy.section36: To comply with legal obligations or law enforcement requests.:
privacyPolicy.section38: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.:
privacyPolicy.section42: Access and update your personal information.:
privacyPolicy.section44: Request the deletion of your personal information.
privacyPolicy.section46: Request a copy of your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
privacyPolicy.section48: Object to the processing of your personal information.
privacyPolicy.section50: Withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal information.
privacyPolicy.section52: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us g.
privacyPolicy.section53: By using our website and services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.

termsConditionsInst.head: Home
termsConditionsInst.paragraph1: eduxa respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data when you visit our Platforms (website and app) (regardless of how or where you visit us from), your privacy rights and how the law protects you. This Privacy Policy is an integral part of the Terms and Conditions. By accepting the Terms and Conditions, you accept the Privacy Policy, and by using the Service on any of the Platforms, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph2: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand how we use and protect your delivery information. We will not share your delivery information with anyone except as described in this policy. This Privacy Policy may change at any time without notice. Please review this policy regularly to ensure you are aware of any changes.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph3: By visiting the Sifter website or application, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use or access our application.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph4: By using the Sifter App, you expressly consent to our use and disclosure of your delivery information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. This Policy is incorporated into the Terms and Conditions that govern your use of the App. Please direct any questions regarding this Policy to
termsConditionsInst.paragraph5: If you make a payment for our products or services on the App, you will be asked to provide the required details directly to our secure payment provider. No debit/credit card details will be passed on to third parties. The Site takes appropriate steps to ensure the confidentiality and security of data, including the use of appropriate hardware and software. However, we cannot guarantee the security of any information disclosed online. The Site is not responsible for the privacy policies of websites linked to it. If you provide any information to these third parties, different policies for the collection and use of personal information may apply. You should contact these entities directly if you have any questions about their use of the information they collect. Some advertisements that appear on the Site and are provided by third parties such as ad networks, advertising agencies, advertisers and service providers may collect information about you and your online activities, whether on the Site itself or on other websites, through cookies, web beacons and other technologies, to understand your interests and deliver personalized advertisements to you. Please note that we do not have access to or control over the information these third parties may collect. This Privacy Policy does not cover the information collection practices of these third parties.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph7: When you use our services on our electronic application, we collect and store your personal information that you provide to us from time to time. Our main goal is to provide you with a safe, efficient and smooth experience. This helps us provide services and features that meet your needs and customize our website to make your experience safer and easier. During this, we collect delivery information necessary to achieve these purposes.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph8: 1. Identity Data: includes first name, maiden name, last name, username or similar identifier, marital status, job title, date of birth, and gender.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph9: 2. Contact Data: includes billing address, order delivery address, email address, and phone numbers.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph10: 3. Financial Data: includes bank account details and payment card details. For online debit/credit card transactions, we transmit your entire card information to the debit/credit card company in encrypted format according to globally accepted rules and practices during order processing. With your consent, we retain a portion of your card information in encrypted format, taking precautions to maintain physical, electronic, and procedural security measures for your credit card information.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph11: 4. Transaction Data: includes details about payments from and to you and other details about the products and services you have purchased from us.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph12: 5. Technical Data: This includes your Internet Protocol address, personally identifiable information, your login data, browser type and version, time zone and location settings, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform, and other technology on the devices you use to access our Platforms.
termsConditionsInst.paragraph13: If you pay for our products or services on the online application, you will be asked to provide the required details directly to our secure payment provider. No debit/credit card details will be passed on to third parties. The site takes appropriate steps to ensure the confidentiality and security of data, including the use of appropriate hardware and software. However, we cannot guarantee the security of any information disclosed online. The site is not responsible for the privacy policies of the sites it links to. If you provide any information to these third parties, different policies for the collection and use of personal information may apply. You should contact these entities directly if you have any questions about their use of the information they collect. Some advertisements that appear on the site and are served by third parties such as advertising networks, advertising agencies, advertisers and service providers, may collect information about you and your online activities, whether on the site itself or on other websites, through cookies, web beacons and other technologies, to understand your interests and deliver personalized advertisements to you. Please note that we do not have access to or control over the information that these third parties may collect. This Privacy Policy does not cover the information collection practices of these third parties.

termsConditionsInst.paragraph15: When you use our services on our electronic application, we collect and store your personal information that you provide to us from time to time. Our main goal is to provide you with a safe, efficient and seamless experience. RefundPolicy.head: Home
RefundPolicy.head3: In case the client wishes to cancel the study application, he must submit a written cancellation request to Eduxa.
RefundPolicy.head4: The following service fees are non-refundable after submitting the application under any circumstances: (University application fees, housing reservation fees, airport transfer fees, medical insurance fees, book fees and use of the services and facilities of the study entity).
RefundPolicy.head5: In case the client wishes to cancel his application during the period of communication with the study entity or after receiving the acceptance decision from the study entity, he is not entitled to claim a refund of the application fee ($500) that he has previously paid. He is also not entitled to recover any amounts paid to the study entity according to the conditions of the study entity. Accordingly, EduXa will notify the study entity of the cancellation of the application.
RefundPolicy.head6: If all the documents required to obtain acceptance are complete and no response is received from the study entity with acceptance or rejection within the expected period mentioned above, the client has the right to recover the application fee amount minus an amount ($300) that EduXa is entitled to as an administrative fee for closing the client's file.
RefundPolicy.head7: In the event that the client wishes to cancel his application after receiving the decision of rejection from the first study authority and does not wish to apply to another study authority or does not have other options available to EduXa, as well as in the event of applying to a second or third study authority and receiving a decision of rejection, the client has the right to recover the application fee, minus the amount of (300 US dollars) that EduXa is entitled to as administrative fees for closing the clientâ€™s file.
RefundPolicy.head9: In case the client wishes to cancel the study application, he must submit a written cancellation request to Eduxa.
RefundPolicy.head10: The following service fees are non-refundable after submitting the application under any circumstances: (EduXa registration fees, registration fees at the study institution, accommodation reservation fees, airport transfer fees, medical insurance fees, book fees and use of the services and facilities of the study institution).
RefundPolicy.head11: In the event of withdrawing the application (cancellation) as a result of the client not obtaining the required visa for the study program due to rejection by the embassy of the study institution's country, the client shall bear a cancellation fee due to EduXa of 250 US dollars in addition to any other fees requested by the study institution.
RefundPolicy.head12: In the event of withdrawing the application (cancellation) or reducing the duration of the study program or the number of its study hours for any reason other than visa rejection, the client shall bear a cancellation fee and fees due to EduXa of 500 US dollars in addition to any other fees requested by the study institution.
RefundPolicy.head13: In the event of any refunds to the customer, he has the right to recover them within 15-45 days or according to the study institution's policy.

metaData.universityTitle: Guaranteed University Admissions to Study Abroad | Eduxa
metaData.universityDescription: We provide you with guaranteed university admission from accredited universities in the US, Canada, the UK, and Europe. A specialized team accompanies you every step of the way until you reach university.
